ABW.caption: ID
ABW.doc: ID of verified sender request, gotten from the "Get verified sender request ID" workflow action.
ABW.name: id

ADC.caption: This plugin supports using either SendGrid or Postmark to send emails. Select the one below that you'd like to use.
ADC.name: info

ADD.caption: Sendgrid API key is called "API Key" in the plugin tab for backward compatibility purposes. API Keys must be set up in the Plugins tab.
ADD.name: info2

ADE.caption: Email provider
ADE.doc: Enter either "sendgrid" or "postmark" in this field. It is not case sensitive. If nothing is entered here, or the text does not match "sendgrid" or "postmark", SendGrid will be used.
ADE.name: email_provider
